nl_problem:
# Task: Nested Logic Test (Depth 7)
# Interface:
Class: Solution
Method: checkNested(self, x0: int, x1: int, x2: int, x3: int, x4: int, x5: int, x6: int) -> bool

# Objective:
This is a test of structural nesting. Return True ONLY if all the following conditions are met:
1. x0 is greater than 0
2. x1 is greater than 0
3. x2 is greater than 0
4. x3 is greater than 0
5. x4 is greater than 0
6. x5 is greater than 0
7. x6 is greater than 0

Each condition must be checked inside the previous one (nested if statements).
lisp_spec:
(task
 (name "checkNested")
 (signature ( (x0 int) (x1 int) (x2 int) (x3 int) (x4 int) (x5 int) (x6 int) ) bool)
 (constraints
   (constraint "All input integers must be greater than 0.")
 )
 (goal
   (description "Check if all input integers are greater than 0, with nested conditions.")
   (rule "Return True only if all integers from x0 to x6 are greater than 0, checked in a nested manner.")
   (return "True if all conditions are met, False otherwise.")
 )
)
